text: The Federated States of Micronesia have been in the Summer Olympic Games three times. They have never won a medal. Games Athletes Gold Silver Bronze Total 2000 Sydney 5 0 0 0 0 2004 Athens 5 0 0 0 0 2008 Beijing 5 0 0 0 0 ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==Other websites == * Federated States of Micronesia profile at London2012.com * Micronesia at SportsReference.com Category:Nations at the Olympics Olympics
title: Federated States of Micronesia at the Olympics
